trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_SEQ_00<tab>Hojo is searching for a strapping specimen to help with some heavy lifting.
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_TODO_01<tab>Place the piles of stones in the designated areas.

TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_000<tab>There's so many frivolous things in this world. We all obsess ourselves with meaningless trinkets and no one stops to consider important things like terraced paddy fields.
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_001<tab>The stones that support each field are in need of constant repair, and yet no one seems to care. It is a tough job for one man alone.
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_002<tab>From the look of you I would say you are capable of lifting a stone or two. Would you mind lending me your strength?
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_003<tab>I will take care of the repair work itself. I simply need you to move several piles of stones to the south closer to the rice paddies.
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_010<tab>Please move those piles of stones to the south closer to the rice paddies.
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_021<tab>Now begins the hard work. One does not simply pile the stones aimlessly─there is a special technique that must be employed.
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_022<tab>I had been training an apprentice, but they were conscripted by that blasted imperial army. Not a day goes by that I do not long for their return.
TEXT_STMBDZ402_02725_HOJO_000_023<tab>Ah, but there I go sharing my entire life story with a total stranger yet again! Here is your reward.
